mapper.insert: insert into board (brd_seq, brd_category, brd_title, brd_content, brd_logtime) values(brd_seq.nextval, #{brd_category}, #{brd_title}, #{brd_content}, SYSDATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET hit=hit+1 WHERE brd_seq=#{brd_seq}
mapper.select: select count(*) from board where ${searchOption} like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
select * from (select rownum rn, tt.* from (select * from board where ${searchOption} like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' order by brd_seq desc)tt) where rn>=#{startNum} and rn<=#{endNum}
